channel.title: Remot desktop trought Tails / Whonix
channel.description: I am sorry if the question has already been posted, but I am a novice to Whonix / tor / Tails. I have used Whonix, and also Tails (in live mode). I want to connect with Tails to a remot desktop , but I am afraid that when I will try to connect to a Remot desktop trought Tails, the RDP will see my real ip connecting, and not the Tails/ Tor ip.

item.title: Remot desktop trought Tails / Whonix
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

With Whonix, IP-Leaks are per design impossible. So and RDP-Server-Provider shouldn’t be able to see your real IP.

Have a nice day,

Ego

Read full topic
